title: [Placements] contact information for placement coordinator
content: The company I am working at wants to come for placements, but PES is not responding. Wanted to check if someone can provide me with the info.

comments.body: google groups will have a placement co ordinator email , use that.
And unfortunately you can have 100 ways to contact him but the decision to reply back is on them. And they usually do not respond lmao
if you're offering 20LPA+, dm me. i might consider the offer.
Which company are you currently working at?
just show up at their front desk, thts btr than contacting by email or something

Thanks everyone for reaching out on comments and dms. One of you sent me somshekars number. Will try contacting him.

It's good to know that he hasn't changed even after so many years as well ðŸ˜‚
